titleStmt.title: The beauty of holines A sermon, preached at the Court by Iohn Archibold, Dr. of Diuinitie, and Chaplaine in Ordinarie to his Majestie.
titleStmt.author: [Archibold, John].

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Stansby for Nathaniel Butter, and are to bee sold at his shop neare S. Austines Gate, at the signe of the Pyde Bull,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
